jjil.j2me
Class Error

java.lang.Object
  java.lang.Throwable
      jjil.core.Error
          jjil.j2me.Error

public class Error
extends jjil.core.Error

This is the class used to create Strings from Error objects when running under J2ME. The point is that the J2ME localization support is used so the same approach won't work with Android, J2SE, etc.
Usage:
jjil.j2me.Error eJ2me = new jjil.j2me.Error(e);
... eJ2me.toString() ...
